long_description: Small enough to take with you on outdoor adventures but big enough to do some real work in the backcountry, the Gerber Sport Axe II offers a tough, sharp blade and a comfortable handle. Strong, durable forged steel blade offers excellent edge retention; plastic sheath guards blade when not in use. Glass-filled nylon handle with overmold allows comfortable grip. Gerber Sport Axe II weighs 1 lb. 8 oz. and measures 14 in. long.
short_description: Small enough to take with you on outdoor adventures but big enough to do some real work in the backcountry, the Gerber Sport Axe II offers a tough, sharp blade and a comfortable handle.
